channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AL

item.title: Report X-2024070925
item.description:
Report X-2024070925

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-15T18:15:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-11
  • City: BESSEMER
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package consists of a fiberboard box containing 4 plastic bottles, each in a plastic bag. One of the caps was either very loose or defective, as it came off completely during inspection. Contents were not contained by the plastic bag, and leaked out, ruining the box. The spill reached a section of rollers and 1 other known package (777213356566). Spill area was covered in neutralizing absorbent powder, then swept and then contained in a lined salvage bin.
